name: Akshay Gangurde
bio: Aspiring web developer passionate about building impactful applications.

projects.name: Wanderlust Travel website
projects.description: Developed a travel website using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and MongoDB
points: Built a full-stack travel platform with secure authentication, CRUD operations for listings using Next.js API routes, Cloudinary image uploads, and interactive maps using MapTiler.
Developed a responsive, modern UI with Tailwind CSS and integrated protected routes with JWT for enhanced security.

projects.name: Pixora Social Media App
projects.description: Created a social media application using Next.js, Redux, MongoDB, Node.js, Express.js, and JWT
points: Developed a responsive frontend using Next.js and managed global state using Redux Toolkit.
Implemented user authentication, post creation, image uploads, likes, and comments.
Integrated Socket.io for Real-time chat functionality.

projects.name: ApnaVideoCall Video Conferencing App
projects.description: Developed a video conferencing application using React, Node.js, Express.js, and Socket.io
points: Used WebRTC and Socket.io to enable peer-to-peer video/audio communication.
Developed frontend UI with React to allow users to join/leave meetings, enable/disable camera and mic.
Built the backend server using Express and managed Real-time signaling with Socket.io.

experience.company: Shri Sant Nagebaba Multistate co-operative credit Society Ltd.
experience.description: Managed office operations and assisted in administrative tasks.
responsibilities: Coordinated office activities and operations to secure efficiency.
Assisted in the preparation of regularly scheduled reports.
